list.title: arrayBytesToHex
list.description: Convert an array of bytes to a hexadecimal string.

list.title: bigIntFromHex
list.description: Convert a hexadecimal string to a BigInt.

list.title: byteArrayToInt
list.description: Convert an array of bytes to a BigInt.

list.title: generateKeys
list.description: Generates cryptographic key pairs and adds details to a JSON file.

list.title: generateKeys~InitPrvKeyBytes
list.description: Generate a random private key as a byte array.

list.title: generateKeys~InitPrvKeyInt
list.description: Convert the byte array to an integer.

list.title: generateKeys~isKeyGood
list.description: Verify the key pair using the message and the private key.

list.title: generateKeys~msg
list.description: Generate a random message as a hexadecimal string.

list.title: generateKeys~pPubKey
list.description: Convert the public key to a byte array and then to a hexadecimal string.

list.title: generateKeys~prvKey
list.description: Determine the private key based on Y evenness.

list.title: generateKeys~prvKeyHex
list.description: Convert the private key to a hexadecimal string.

list.title: generateKeys~pubKey
list.description: Multiply the base public key by the private key.

list.title: hasEvenY
list.description: Check if the Y-coordinate of a point on the elliptic curve is even.

list.title: hexFromBigInt
list.description: Convert a BigInt to a hexadecimal string.

list.title: hexToArrayBytes
list.description: Convert a hexadecimal string to an array of bytes.

list.title: hexToBigInt
list.description: Convert a hexadecimal string to a BigInt.

list.title: intToByteArray
list.description: Convert an integer to an array of bytes.

list.title: main
list.description: The main function that handles user interactions and executes selected operations.

list.title: returnPrivateKey
list.description: Read a private key from a JSON file.

list.title: signSchnorr
list.description: Sign a message using Schnorr signature.

list.title: signSchnorr~LSign
list.description: Compute LSign and RSign as hexadecimal strings.

list.title: signSchnorr~P
list.description: Compute the public key and determine the private key based on Y evenness.

list.title: signSchnorr~d0
list.description: Convert the private key to a bigint.

list.title: signSchnorr~e
list.description: Compute e as a bigint.

list.title: signSchnorr~k0
list.description: Compute k0 as a bigint.

list.title: signSchnorr~nonceValue
list.description: Generate a random nonce value.

list.title: signSchnorr~pPubKey
list.description: Pack the public key as an array of bytes and compute hash values.

list.title: signSchnorr~r
list.description: Compute r as a point on the elliptic curve.

list.title: updateJson
list.description: Update a JSON file with a new object.

list.title: verifyKeyPair
list.description: Verify a key pair using Schnorr signature.

list.title: verifySignature
list.description: Verify a Schnorr signature.

list.title: x
list.description: Extract the X-coordinate from a point on the elliptic curve.

list.title: y
list.description: Extract the Y-coordinate from a point on the elliptic curve.
